text1: A modified Damper Field that instead of a static aura protecting the hull generates a wave that pulls the entire ship in its wake allowing for seemingly impossible dodges in addition to its temporary protection. Holds many charges that slowly regenerate.
text3: Generates a protective wave reducing incoming damage and propelling the ship in the desired direction.

text1: Briefly allows every systems to operate way beyond their standard limit, dramatically increasing firerate and weapon rotations.
text3: Dramatically increases the weapons rotation speed and fire-rate for a few seconds.
Provides a massive speed boost Includes invulnerable shields. Collisions won't cause a flameout.
